description: Production-ready ecommerce backend built with Express.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, and Cloudinary. Follows Test-Driven Development (TDD) principles with comprehensive test coverage.
rules: Use Express.js with TypeScript for API development
Use MongoDB with Mongoose for database operations
Use Cloudinary for image uploads and storage
Implement JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens
Use role-based access control (admin, seller, customer)
Implement proper error handling with unified error response format
Use pnpm as the package manager
Follow existing code style and structure
Use early returns for better code readability
Implement proper security measures: Helmet, CORS, rate limiting, secure cookies
